speaker: CORNWALL
text: I will have my revenge ere I depart his

speaker: CORNWALL
text: house.

speaker: EDMUND
text: How, my lord, I may be censured, that nature

speaker: EDMUND
text: thus gives way to loyalty, something fears me to

speaker: EDMUND
text: think of.

speaker: CORNWALL
text: I now perceive it was not altogether your

speaker: CORNWALL
text: brother’s evil disposition made him seek his death,

speaker: CORNWALL
text: but a provoking merit set awork by a reprovable

speaker: CORNWALL
text: badness in himself.

speaker: EDMUND
text: How malicious is my fortune that I must

speaker: EDMUND
text: repent to be just! This is the letter he spoke of,

speaker: EDMUND
text: which approves him an intelligent party to the

speaker: EDMUND
text: advantages of France. O heavens, that this treason

speaker: EDMUND
text: were not, or not I the detector.

speaker: CORNWALL
text: Go with me to the Duchess.

speaker: EDMUND
text: If the matter of this paper be certain, you

speaker: EDMUND
text: have mighty business in hand.

speaker: CORNWALL
text: True or false, it hath made thee Earl of

speaker: CORNWALL
text: Gloucester. Seek out where thy father is, that he

speaker: CORNWALL
text: may be ready for our apprehension.

speaker: EDMUND
text: If I find him comforting the King, it

speaker: EDMUND
text: will stuff his suspicion more fully.—I will persevere

speaker: EDMUND
text: in my course of loyalty, though the conflict be sore

speaker: EDMUND
text: between that and my blood.

speaker: CORNWALL
text: I will lay trust upon thee, and thou shalt

speaker: CORNWALL
text: find a dearer father in my love.
